1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Dots pattern.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.List.Dots
7  ( dotsStrings,
8    undotsStrings,
9    takeDots,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Data.Char                           as Ch
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List.Split     as B
14
15trimLeft :: String -> String
16trimLeft = dropWhile Ch.isSpace
17
18pattern Dots a s = '.' : '.' : '.' : a : s
19
20undup :: (Eq a) => a -> [a] -> [a]
21undup k = loop where
22    loop [] = []
23    loop [x1] = [x1]
24    loop (x1 : x2 : xs)
25               | x1 == k && x2 == k  = loop (x2 : xs)
26               | otherwise           = x1 : loop (x2 : xs)
27
28-- | Divide dots-pattern string.
29--
30--   >>> dotsStrings "abc ... xyz"
31--   ["abc","...","xyz"]
32--
33--   >>> dotsStrings "a ... h ... ... v ..."
34--   ["a","...","h","...","v","..."]
35
36dotsStrings :: String -> [String]
37dotsStrings = begin where
38    begin (Dots a s)
39        | Ch.isSpace a     = dots (mid "" $ trimLeft s)
40    begin s                = mid "" s
41
42    mid w (b : Dots a s)
43        | Ch.isSpace b &&
44          Ch.isSpace a     = revTrim w : dots (begin $ trimLeft s)
45    mid w (c:s)            = mid (c:w) s
46    mid w ""               = end w
47
48    end (Dots a w)
49        | Ch.isSpace a     = revTrim w : dots []
50    end w                  = [reverse w]
51
52    dots pat@("..." : _)   = pat
53    dots pat               = "..." : pat
54
55    revTrim                = reverse . trimLeft
56
57-- | Concatenate dots-pattern strings,
58--   inserting one space between dots and word.
59--
60--   >>> undotsStrings ["abc", "...", "xyz"]
61--   "abc ... xyz"
62--
63--   >>> undotsStrings ["a", "...", "h", "...", "...", "v", "..."]
64--   "a ... h ... v ..."
65
66undotsStrings :: [String] -> String
67undotsStrings = loop "" . undup "..." where
68    loop sp ["..."]       = sp ++ "..."
69    loop sp ("..." : xs)  = sp ++ "..." ++ loop " " xs
70    loop sp (x : xs)      = sp ++ x     ++ loop " " xs
71    loop _ []             = ""
72
73-- | Take dots-parts from string.
74--
75--   >>> takeDots ["a", "...", "h", "...", "v", "..."] "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"
76--   Just ["bcdefg","ijklmnopqrstu","wxyz"]
77--
78--   >>> takeDots ["a", "...", "h", "...", "v", "..."] "abcdefg"
79--   Nothing
80
81takeDots :: [String] -> String -> Maybe [String]
82takeDots = takeBy (== "...")
83
84takeBy :: (Eq a) => ([a] -> Bool) -> [[a]] -> [a] -> Maybe [[a]]
85takeBy dots = loop False where
86    loop _ [] []       = Just []  -- pattern and data are matched
87    loop _ []  _       = Nothing  -- data remains
88    loop _ [p] s
89        | dots p       = Just [s] -- dot pattern matches tail part
90    loop ad (p : ps) s
91        | dots p       = loop True ps s                  -- entering after-dots (ad) state
92        | ad           = do (d, _, a) <- B.splitSub p s  -- dots-part and after-part
93                            a' <- loop False ps a
94                            Just $ d : a'
95        | otherwise    = do a <- B.dropSub p s           -- drop pattern
96                            loop False ps a
97
98-- dotsStrings "...def"
99-- dotsStrings "... def"
100-- dotsStrings " abc "
101-- dotsStrings "abc...def"
102-- dotsStrings "abc ..."
103-- dotsStrings "abc ... def ... hij"
104-- dotsStrings "abc  ...  def"
105-- dotsStrings "abc ... ... def"
106-- dotsStrings "abc ...... def"
107
108-- undotsStrings ["...", "abc"]
109-- undotsStrings ["...", "abc", "...", "...", "fg"]
110
111-- takeDots "..." ["a", "..."] "abcdefg"
112-- takeDots "..." ["a", "...", "g"] "abcdefg"
113-- takeDots "..." ["a", "...", "e", "...", "g"] "abcdefg"
